nodes.bodyText: MatDialog and MAT_DIALOG_DEFAULT_OPTIONS aren't used.

On the 'false', the warning 'wrong attribute value' occurs...

nodes.bodyText: This is the default value, isn't it? In case this is true, please remove it.
unused import?
please add 'should create component'
The HTML is not tested. In case you don't want to add tests here, we could create a new ticket.
We don't use jasmine anymore, instead we use jest. I think this is sufficient: const mockDialogRef = jest.fn();
What is the type of groups? In case it is possible, please add a type.
Since you are using ngOnInit(), please add 'implements OnInit'
I get the warning 'Unresolved variable or type panelOpenState'.
